import React, { useState } from "react"; import ReactMarkdown from "react-markdown"; import { GoogleGenerativeAI } from "@google/generative-ai"; function AIDoctor() { const systemMessage = { role: "system", parts: [ { text: "You are an AI doctor. Only answer questions that ask about diseases. You can give medicine for minor ailments, but if asked about major ailments, you must inform the user to see a doctor. Additionally, educate them about the disease related to their symptoms.", }, ], }; const [history, setHistory] = useState([systemMessage]); // Initial system message const [response, setResponse] = useState(""); const [input, setInput] = useState(""); // To capture user input // Function to handle sending a new message const handleSendMessage = async () => { try { const genAI = new GoogleGenerativeAI( "AIzaSyBhtwZ7D1H9w6iAg31HcO2CankgOh5dsHk" ); const model = genAI.getGenerativeModel({ model: "gemini-1.5-flash" }); // Add the user's message to the history const updatedHistory = [ ...history, { role: "user", parts: [{ text: input }], }, ]; setHistory(updatedHistory); // Update local history with system message intact const chat = model.startChat({ history: updatedHistory }); const result = await chat.sendMessage(input); // Send user input as message const text = await result.response.text(); // Await the model's response // Add the AI model's response to the history setHistory([ ...updatedHistory, // Preserve the system message and user input { role: "model", parts: [{ text }], }, ]); console.log(text); setInput(""); // Clear the input field after sending the message setResponse(text); // Update the UI with the latest response } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching AI response:", error); } }; return (

); } export default AIDoctor;
